response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its true worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure both parties' satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can make this transaction beneficial for all involved.", "product_price": 1350000}
